{"id":1020701051,"question_id":6,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1691981107,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1020701051/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"44.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n        \n        \n        if(numRows==1)\n            return s;\n        \n        List<Character>[] arr = new List[numRows];\n        \n        boolean goDown = false;\n        \n        int idx = 0;\n        \n        for(char ch : s.toCharArray()){\n            \n            if(arr[idx]==null)\n                arr[idx] = new ArrayList<>();\n            \n            arr[idx].add(ch);\n            \n            \n            if(idx==0 || idx==numRows-1){\n                goDown = !goDown;\n            }\n            \n            if(goDown)\n                idx++;\n            else \n                idx--;\n        }\n        \n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        \n        for(List<Character> list : arr){\n            \n            if(list!=null)\n            for(char ch : list){\n                sb.append(ch);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
